name: Wave_Machine
description:
The life of a Wave_Machine is a simple one: enjoy the  golden sandy shores and protect the local eco sphere. Most days tend to be run of the mill, but there's been a terrible ALIEN INVASION! Go, and save your neighbours in need! 

This is me and Tom's first ever game release, and first ever game jam (MechJam 2021)! Hope you all enjoy <3
